live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
38924.summary: Customers in the Clareview Campus area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38924.title: June 26 – Edmonton (Clareview Campus) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
